title: september 29: how the world almost ended
description:
There was quite a panic when the Mayan’s predicted the world would end back in 2012. In today’s episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia teaches us about the time the world almost did end in 2004. Although unpredicted, the asteroid 4179 Toutatis did get a little too close for comfort. Luckily, we’re all still here and far from an apocalyptic scare. In the theme of supposide ends, Maia also reveals the beef between 50 Cent and Kanye that almost ended one of their careers. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.

itunes:author: mxmtoon
